thread.section_title: AMOMA.com Bewertungen | Kundenbewertungen von AMOMA.com | www.amoma.com
thread.title: Daniel Boni

author: Daniel Boni
title: Daniel Boni
text:
This was the first booking I have made through Amoma.com. Having read some negative reviews regarding amoma.com I was slightly apprehensive about booking through them but considering how much cheaper they are I decided to give them a go. Booking was easy and costs transparent. When I arrived at the hotel checking in was quick and easy. Unfortunately, the hotel had my booking under a twin room rather than a double. I called amoma customer support on a Saturday evening and immediately spoke to an advisor who called the hotel directly
resolved the issue and called me back to explain everything. I was moved to a double room and have no concerns using amoma again. Way cheaper than other third party booking websites.
